entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Near blizzard developing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 42 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending in the morning then sunny. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 42 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
